text: In @SciImmunology: @rishirajgoel, @EJohnWherry, and @PennMedicine scientists show that one dose of mRNA #COVID19 #vaccine induces optimal antibody and #Bcell responses in previously infected people. Two doses are needed for immunologically naïve people. https://t.co/mTNdROGe8R https://t.co/4yTq71YcoF
